segments.text: With tomorrow being Labor Day and all , I think it would be a nice gesture to let all the members of laboring staff leave work an hour early . What do you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ! That sounds perfectly ridiculous ! Labour Day is a holiday for everyone , not just laboring staff ... and we get a whole day off tomorrow anyway , so what's the point of an extra hour tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we all get Labour Day off as a holiday , the real purpose of the holiday is to remember all the people who do manual or other hard labor . It's to celebrate those who work doing what other people might not be willing to do . I think we ought to do something in honor of the common worker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So if we did allow the laboring force to go home early , how many people are we talking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In our company , the loborial force makes up 60 % of our workers . We'd just be letting slightly over half the folks out a little early .
segments.speaker: S1
